SELECT b.title, br.borrow_date, br.return_date, (CASE WHEN b.is_borrowed = 1 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END) AS isBorrowed, u.username FROM books b LEFT JOIN borrow_records br ON b.book_id = br.book_id LEFT JOIN user u ON br.user_id = u.user_id
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
AND b.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
